brainbox.io: Functions for data I/O through Brainbox¶

The purpose of the io submodule is to provide utilities for reading in, exporting, and transforming data via brainbox. This includes manipulation of matlab arrays of spikes into python friendly format, and export into .mat files among other things.

Functions¶

extract_waveforms(ephys_file, ts, ch[, t, …])

Extracts spike waveforms from binary ephys data file, after (optionally) common-average-referencing (CAR) spatial noise.
